Traits.Name: Receive Orders
Traits.Description: When this unit starts its turn in range of a command aura, it recharges all its abilities.

Actions.Name: Arkentech Mine
Actions.Description: The Demolitionist places an intangible size 1 summon in a space in range 3. If any character moves or is shoved more than 1 space over or adjacent to the mine, it explodes for heavy damage in a blast 1 area effect and inflicts burning.

Actions.Name: Detonate Mines
Actions.Description: All mines laid by the demolitionist explode as if triggered.
